entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have gained Jak Chucka's trust and respect. As such, he decrypted the information wanted by Broma Lak.
entries.journal_entry_description: Broma Lak directed you to a Gungan informant named Jak Chucka.  Before Jak will decrypt the Gungan record bauble, he wants some...problems taken care of.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Broma Lak wants you to contact a Gungan informant named Jak Chucka. He may be able to decrypt the Gungan record bauble...if you can convince him to help.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Well...you've met Jak.  Now you must find a way to convince the reluctant Gungan that he should help decrypt the record bauble. He may be willing to negotiate.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You have successfully convinced Jak Chucka to decode the bauble, but some bandits have stolen the pieces of his translator unit. Follow the instructions Jak provided to recover the pieces.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Bring the decrypted information to Broma Lak near Theed.
